log.description: Log output and error to files (std***.log).
log.title: The Log schema.

mode.description: The processing mode to use, RUNTIME to obtain only output products faster, DEBUG to obtain all intermediate files
mode.title: The Mode schema.

tile_id.description: The identifier of the tile corresponding to the input input_products_list products
tile_id.title: The Tile_id schema.

input_products_list.description: The input products list, containing the paths of homogeneous snow products only on tile_id at same resolution and size
input_products_list.title: The input_products_list schema.

path_tmp.description: The path where to store temporary files, else the application try to retrive $TMPDIR in env
path_tmp.title: The Path_tmp schema.

use_densification.description: Activate the densification using snow products from heterogeneous sensors
use_densification.title: The Use_densification schema.

densification_products_list.description: The densification list, containing the paths of heterogenous snow products from heterogeneous sensors
densification_products_list.title: The densification_products_list schema.

date_start.description: Start of the date range for which we want to generate the snow_annual_map (DD/MM/YYYY)
date_start.title: The Date_start schema.

date_stop.description: Stop of the date range for which we want to generate the snow_annual_map (DD/MM/YYYY)
date_stop.title: The Date_stop schema.

date_margin.description: The margin ouside the date range to use for better interpolation results (in days)
date_margin.title: The Date_margin schema.

ram.description: Maximum number of RAM memory used by the program.
ram.title: The Ram schema.

nb_threads.description: Maximum number of threads use by the program.
nb_threads.title: The Nb_threads schema.

properties.comments: the following parameters concerns only the snow_annual_map_evaluation

run_comparison_evaluation.description: Activate the one to one comparison using snow products from heterogeneous sensors
run_comparison_evaluation.title: The run_comparison_evaluation schema.

comparison_products_list.description: The comparison list, containing the paths of heterogenous snow products to compare with daily interpolation
comparison_products_list.title: The comparison_products_list schema.

run_modis_comparison.description: Activate the comparison between annual map and modis snow annual map
run_modis_comparison.title: The run_modis_comparison schema.

modis_snow_map.description: The path to the modis daily snow masks (one file with one band per day)
modis_snow_map.title: The modis_snow_map schema.

modis_snow_map_dates.description: The dates corresponding to the bands of the modis_snow_map
modis_snow_map_dates.title: The modis_snow_map_dates schema.

dem.description: The dem to use during modis comparison, to generate snow per altitude slices
dem.title: The dem schema.
